titleStmt.title: A learned and very usefull commentary upon the whole prophesie of Malachy, by that late Reverend, Godly and Learned Divine, Mr. Richard Stock, sometime Rector of Alhallowes Breadstreet, London, and now according to the originall copy left by him, published for the common good. Whereunto is added, An exercitation vpon the same prophesie of Malachy / by Samuel Torshell.
titleStmt.author: Stock, Richard, 1569?-1626.
Torshell, Samuel, 1604-1650. Exercitation upon the prophecie of Malachy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.H. and R.H. for Samuel Enderbey, and are to be sold at the Starr in Popes head alley,

notesStmt.note: Torshell's "An exercitation upon the prophesie of Malachy" has special t.p., with imprint: London, Printed by Edward Griffin, for Daniel Frere, Thomas Nichols and Samuel Enderbey, and are to be sold at their shops in Little Brittaine and Popes-head Alley, 1640.
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.

place.placeName: the Starr in Popes head alley
